```{r setup}
library(varistran)
library(airway)

data("airway")
x <- assay(airway, "counts")
lnorm <- samesum_log2_norm(x, scale=0.25)

plot_heatmap(lnorm, feature_labels=rowData(airway)$symbol, n=50)

plot_stability(lnorm, bins=200)
```
